Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine flour and sugar. Beat in butter and egg yolks. Press into an ungreased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.  For filling, in a bowl, beat eggs.  stir in the walnuts, sugar and vanilla.  Pour over crust. Bake at 300 degrees F for 55-60 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely on a wire rack. Dust with confectioners' sugar. Cut into bars.
